description:
Quantities of dredged material dumped per calendar year since 2007 (tonnes dry matter) on the respective dumping sites.

Source: Lauwaert, B.; De Witte, B.; Devriese, L.; Fettweis, M.; Martens, C.; Timmermans, S.; Van Hoey, G.; Vanlede, J. (2016). Synthesis report on the effects of dredged material dumping on the marine environment (licensing period 2012-2016). RBINS-OD Nature/ILVO/AMT - Afdeling Maritieme Toegang/AMCS/FHR: Brussels. 107 pp.
name: Quantities of dredged material dumped per dumping site (Belgian part of North Sea, 2007-2015)
